experiences.name: community_space
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Community Space
experiences.description: Whether for love of vintage records or a shared city to call home, communities are a powerful way to discover and nurture common ground with others. This Experience offers some templates to help you get your special-interest community up and running.

experiences.name: crm_basic_approach
experiences.author: https://github.com/geladariia
experiences.title: CRM: Basic Approach
experiences.description: Simplified approach for those who need a personalised system with orders/projects and who work with not too much customer/client data.

experiences.name: daily_journal
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Daily Journal
experiences.description: 95% of our thoughts are repetitive. Build a ritual of daily journaling to cultivate presence and reflect on your thought patterns.

experiences.name: data_vault
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Data Vault
experiences.description: Keep encrypted copies of your essential documents so you are never caught unprepared.

experiences.name: family_space
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Family Space
experiences.description: Welcome to your very own Family Space, where everything you share is reserved solely for those closest to you. Designed knowing that every family is unique, we hope this experience will make communication and organization easy and enjoyable for your family.

experiences.name: frm_friends_relationship_management
experiences.author: https://github.com/geladariia
experiences.title: FRM: Friends Relationship Management
experiences.description:
FRM - is not just about «managing» your friends. It’s also about a simple idea, that being friends means paying attention.
Organize & remember your meetings, convert them into thoughts & feelings, and don’t forget your friends during this busy time online.

experiences.name: habit_tracker
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Habit Tracker
experiences.description: Become your best self and document the results of your healthy habits. Track your sleep, energy, mood and more using a habit tracker.

experiences.name: homepages
experiences.author: https://github.com/geladariia
experiences.title: Homepages
experiences.description: Just some simple ideas for developing your start page, if you don't know where to start!

experiences.name: language_flashcards
experiences.author: https://github.com/geladariia
experiences.title: Language Flashcards
experiences.description: Practise the new language by creating beautiful cards with images as visual associations, descriptions as translations and pop-up spoilers in text, linking cards to other objects.

experiences.name: legacy_homepage
experiences.author: https://github.com/filip-anytype
experiences.title: Legacy Homepage
experiences.description: Re-creation of the old homepage design from the Anytype Alpha days.

experiences.name: movie_database
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Movie Database
experiences.description: For true cinema aficionados: Build your very own knowledge base of watched and bucket list movies with this Movie Database template.

experiences.name: neighbors_space
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Neighbors Space
experiences.description: Whether you live in a big city or in the quiet suburbs, creating community with those closest to you makes everyone's shared life better. Designed for practical communication and exchange between neighbors, we hope you'll enjoy connecting with your neighbors!

experiences.name: paid_subscriptions_tracking
experiences.author: https://github.com/geladariia
experiences.title: Paid Subscriptions Tracking
experiences.description: Track recurring expenses by saving your subscription information in one place.

experiences.name: para_lite
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: PARA - Lite
experiences.description: An approach towards digital minimalism & productivity based on Tiago Forte's popular method. This experience uses collections, tags, and sets to help you make order of your graph.

experiences.name: plant_database
experiences.author: https://github.com/geladariia
experiences.title: Plant Database
experiences.description: Add characteristics, care, growing details and create a database of your plants using a customisable template.

experiences.name: project_management
experiences.author: https://github.com/geladariia
experiences.title: Project Management
experiences.description: Focused on planned objectives and daily/weekly tasks, an organised flow will help you keep track of personal projects.

experiences.name: recipe_book_and_meal_planner
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Recipe Book and Meal Planner
experiences.description: Good food, good mood. Categorize recipes based on your personal needs and create meal plans that suit your time, taste, and dietary preferences.

experiences.name: space_for_digital_creators
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Space for Digital Creators
experiences.description: Whether you're a creator in the field of personal health, gaming, skincare or self-improvement, here's a space for you to cultivate evergreen content and grow your community. Use it to create announcements, add recommendations, or links to your own articles.

experiences.name: startup_planner
experiences.author: https://github.com/geladariia
experiences.title: Startup Planner
experiences.description:
Startup Planner will help you develop an idea for a new business project: the groundwork is already laid in the Experience. 
Use this plan as a guide to action, finding detailed steps and points for further research.

experiences.name: study_hub
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Study Hub
experiences.description: One place to keep your course schedule, syllabus, study notes, assignments, and tasks. Link it all together in the graph for richer insights.

experiences.name: team_space
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Team Space
experiences.description: A space to collaborate with your teammates. Designed for small, techy teams that don't want their productivity hindered by server outages. Includes a team wiki, bugs tracker, and events calendar.

experiences.name: trip_planner
experiences.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
experiences.title: Trip Planner
experiences.description: Travel with half the hassle. Keep your tickets, bookings, and reference information all in one place, so you do not need to fuss over wifi while traveling.

experiences.name: zettelkasten_smart_notes
experiences.author: https://github.com/geladariia
experiences.title: Zettelkasten: Smart Notes
experiences.description:
The Zettelkasten method is about optimising your workflow of writing and producing knowledge. 
Smart notes system is like a second brain, helping you to explore new ideas and views in a way that they can be easily discovered and reused.

experiences.name: a_student_need
experiences.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
experiences.title: A Student Need
experiences.description: Students can use this template to plan homework tasks and exam arrangements for each semester.

experiences.name: actionable_items
experiences.author: https://github.com/francodgstn
experiences.title: Actionable Items
experiences.description: A simple personal backlog for Anytype, designed for real life. Focus on what matters —your wishes, tasks, and more— without the hassle of due dates or complex planning.

experiences.name: advanced_project_management
experiences.author: https://github.com/canpolatbaris
experiences.title: Advanced Project Management
experiences.description: Manage projects by creating milestones and goals, track tasks, and manage your risks.

experiences.name: adventure_hub
experiences.author: https://github.com/Adventure-nerd
experiences.title: Adventure Hub
experiences.description: Here you can track your adventure plans or "bucket list" adventures. I have included several Adventure Types to make it easier. Anything that is irrelevant to you , you can delete the Type in the library, and the corresponding set.

experiences.name: animation_database
experiences.author: https://github.com/Fradeet
experiences.title: Animation Database
experiences.description: The experience can help you manage and track anime, character, music, related news. Version 1, base and test on Japanese animation.

experiences.name: anti_aging_workout_by_bryan_johnson
experiences.author: https://github.com/Balcion
experiences.title: Anti-Aging Workout by Bryan Johnson
experiences.description:
Please note that all content is the original work of Bryan Johnson! Everything Bryan does is free and shareable! I've edited and structured the parts for convenience.

HD files-> https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Af4WFHazjYaK02nye8soLQ-cHhrf-Dy

experiences.name: anyday
experiences.author: https://github.com/minhashemi
experiences.title: AnyDay
experiences.description: Turn your words into memories with AnyDay, capturing and reflecting on life's moments.

experiences.name: anytype_for_content_creators
experiences.author: https://github.com/AlderpenGhub
experiences.title: AnyType for Content Creators
experiences.description: This template is a simple tool to allow new Content Creators to have a way to manage and track their video production workflow. With an intuitive menu on the left and author notes with video tutorials that will be coming in April of 2024.

experiences.name: classical_music_database
experiences.author: https://github.com/Fradeet
experiences.title: Classical Music Database
experiences.description:
You can use this gallery to record the classical music, and track which had listened.
- Set 'Create': default template.
- Build-in template improve your input.
- Quick check info on in-line set.
- 'Useful Classical Resource' collection can save something.

experiences.name: coffee_tracker
experiences.author: https://github.com/p1xelll
experiences.title: Coffee Tracker
experiences.description: Embark on your coffee journey with half the effort. Keep your coffee types, brewing methods, and taste impressions all in one place.

experiences.name: create_your_own_world
experiences.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
experiences.title: Create Your Own World
experiences.description: Focus on yourself and record every experience in your life.

experiences.name: crochet_dashboard
experiences.author: https://github.com/sfal
experiences.title: Crochet Dashboard
experiences.description: All-in-one hub for managing your crochet projects, yarn collection, and patterns. Record your project details such as yarn used, hook size, and pattern. Keep a catalog of your yarn stash with details such as brand, color, fiber and so on.

experiences.name: customizable_dashboard
experiences.author: https://github.com/pikacho13
experiences.title: Customizable Dashboard
experiences.description: Dashboard: major project links, task overview. Routine tasks are habitual. Personal & Work tasks prioritized (1-3), optional reminders. Quick notes for temp ideas. Custom templates for easy access. Customize as desired.

experiences.name: focus_matrix_all_in_one_page
experiences.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
experiences.title: Focus Matrix-All In One Page
experiences.description: A compact, all-in-one tool for daily reflections, task prioritization, and personal growth, keeping everything organized on a single page.

experiences.name: formula_1
experiences.author: https://github.com/DanielZolfaghari
experiences.title: Formula 1
experiences.description: Experience Formula 1 like never before!

experiences.name: freelance_dashboard
experiences.author: https://github.com/p1xelll
experiences.title: Freelance Dashboard
experiences.description: Keep everything for your business in one place. Manage clients, projects, tasks and meetings all in one place and stay on top of your finances.

experiences.name: g_o_a_t_system
experiences.author: https://github.com/icreateeffects
experiences.title: G.O.A.T System
experiences.description:
G.O.A.T System
G – Goals: Set clear long and short-term Projects.
O – Orientation: Morning ritual to choose 2-3 priority tasks and task planning.
A – Achievements: Evening log of wins & lessons.
T – Tasks: Your Daily Tasks which work as notes.

experiences.name: gaming_hud
experiences.author: https://github.com/Fryker
experiences.title: Gaming Hud
experiences.description: This experience is meant to offer a place where you can keep all your games organized, both those you own and those you want to own, as well as keep track of which ones you have completed, planned, played, etc.

experiences.name: gear_log
experiences.author: https://github.com/GitYohan
experiences.title: Gear Log
experiences.description: Tired of digging through emails for receipts or wondering if your gear’s still under warranty? This log keeps everything in one place, purchases, serials, repairs, and more, so you always know what’s what, and when it needs love.

experiences.name: healthos
experiences.author: https://github.com/GitYohan
experiences.title: HealthOS
experiences.description: Track your full medical history. Visits, bills, and medications, in one organized, offline and encrypted system. Start with a visit and link everything else from there.

experiences.name: integrated_library
experiences.author: https://github.com/ChristianHaake
experiences.title: Integrated Library
experiences.description: Integrated library is a display of the books you read, or you are still reading. It includes Covers, tags and other attributes.

experiences.name: items_lent_out_borrowed_tracker
experiences.author: https://github.com/nima9
experiences.title: Items Lent out/Borrowed Tracker
experiences.description: This is really useful for keeping tracking of things that I have borrowed or things I have lent out to others.

experiences.name: jcdflashcards
experiences.author: https://github.com/jcdescy
experiences.title: jcdFlashcards
experiences.description: Inspired by [@geladariia](https://github.com/geladariia)'s Language Flashcards Experience, which I would absolutely use for language learning. However I have a different use case, so I tried my hand at my own version. Feedback always welcome.

experiences.name: journal_diary
experiences.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
experiences.title: Journal & Diary
experiences.description: This is the interface of a journal planning system. The overall layout is simple and bright, allowing users to easily manage and record their goals, plans, and daily life details.

experiences.name: meeting_notes_management
experiences.author: https://github.com/ChristianHaake
experiences.title: Meeting Notes Management
experiences.description: Object type, template and set for meeting notes management. Check the article for a full explanation: https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-Meetingnotes/2023_Antype-Meetingnotes-EN.html

experiences.name: para_and_coder_setup
experiences.author: https://github.com/ChristianHaake
experiences.title: PARA and CODER Setup
experiences.description: The PARA concept, which divides information into the categories of Projects, Areas, Resources, and Archives, provides a structuring level that organizes processes and knowledge in a clear and comprehensible manner. For a detailed explanation, check the article: https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-mit-PARA/2023_Using-PARA-with-Anytype-EN.html

experiences.name: para_tasks_resources_meeting_notes_crm
experiences.author: https://github.com/ChristianHaake
experiences.title: Fully integrated Experience
experiences.description:
This Experience includes the following aspects: PARA, Meeting notes, CRM, Library, Wiki, Tasks and Projects. For in detail explanation, check out my articles:
- https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-Dashboard/2023_Anytype-Dashboard-EN.html
- https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-Meetingnotes/2023_Antype-Meetingnotes-EN.html
- https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Mein-PKM_mit-CODE/2023_MY-PKM-with-Code.html
- https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-mit-PARA/2023_Using-PARA-with-Anytype-EN.html

experiences.name: para_with_collections
experiences.author: https://github.com/wjkw1
experiences.title: PARA with Collections
experiences.description: Organise your life in Anytype by using PARA with Collections. Harness the power of queries, collections, custom properties, smart dashboards, and flexible templates for clarity, scalability, and productivity managing your personal knowledge and projects.

experiences.name: personal_and_work_pkm
experiences.author: https://github.com/MarcoBarna
experiences.title: Personal and Work PKM
experiences.description: This experience seamlessly integrates work and personal knowledge, offering a mobile-friendly interface. It can be used to enhance collaboration. Each template includes links to tasks, contacts, or companies, making it intuitive and efficient to use.

experiences.name: plant_tracker
experiences.author: https://github.com/p1xelll
experiences.title: Plant Tracker
experiences.description: Plant Tracker is your digital plant oasis. Keep your houseplant jungle organised with details like watering schedules, light requirements and happy snaps to track their growth.

experiences.name: podcast_database
experiences.author: https://github.com/R0verDan
experiences.title: Podcast Database
experiences.description: Keep track of your favourite podcasts, with the ability to rate, sort through genre, note production houses and distributors, and link to websites and Spotify pages. Easily expandable and adaptable.

experiences.name: routine_set_ticker
experiences.author: https://github.com/darshansharma
experiences.title: Routine Set Ticker
experiences.description: Crossing off daily habits, routines, or tasks provides that much-needed "shot in the arm" of dopamine, propelling you forward. It ensures that you "keep the ball rolling," even when the temptation to stop is strong, thus cultivating a "can-do" attitude.

experiences.name: rpg_repository
experiences.author: https://github.com/7ede
experiences.title: RPG Repository
experiences.description: Dear DMs, this Experience will allow you to manage the Campaigns of your favorite RPGs with a series of elements designed to archive information with order and precision. The whole thing is adaptable to different rulesets with ease. Demo campaign included!

experiences.name: service_catalog
experiences.author: https://github.com/mishachepi
experiences.title: Service Catalog
experiences.description: This template will help you organize your resources in the digital world. It allows you to track subscriptions, monitor accounts and navigate your digital resources of any type: social networks, applications, subscriptions, etc.

experiences.name: simple_second_brain
experiences.author: https://github.com/CH1HU4HU4
experiences.title: Simple Second Brain
experiences.description: A simple second brain for getting on top of things without losing your mind or having setup paralysis

experiences.name: simple_tables
experiences.author: https://github.com/geladariia
experiences.title: Simple Tables
experiences.description: A collection of table templates with examples to use for a variety of purposes.

experiences.name: solution_log
experiences.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
experiences.title: Solution log
experiences.description: A simple, easy-to-use template to record problems from daily life and work, with tools for reflection, solutions, and goal-setting.

experiences.name: space_for_student
experiences.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
experiences.title: Space for Student
experiences.description: Space for Student is a learning and task management tool designed for students, making it easy to track assignments, courses, and important tasks.

experiences.name: story_forge_project_manager
experiences.author: https://github.com/axisnova
experiences.title: Story Forge Project Manager
experiences.description:
A place to write and develop a fictional story and develop a more living and breathing fleshed out story.
Version 1

experiences.name: subscription_tracker
experiences.author: https://github.com/p1xelll
experiences.title: Subscription Tracker
experiences.description: Simplify your finances. Manage all your subscriptions in one place.

experiences.name: ultimate_student_os
experiences.author: https://github.com/ThatTakashi
experiences.title: Ultimate Student OS
experiences.description: The ultimate space for students! Student OS provides everything you need to take effective notes and ace all your classes. Student OS is also built to be extendable and customizable.

experiences.name: unified_space
experiences.author: https://github.com/emagech
experiences.title: Unified Space
experiences.description:
This setup is a unified system combining productivity and PKM with the possibility to filter personal and professional data.

It's an all-in-one solution that borrows elements from PARA and GTD methodologies in a visually minimalist setup.

experiences.name: yapkms_yet_another_pkm_space
experiences.author: https://github.com/telmob
experiences.title: YAPKMS - Yet Another PKM Space
experiences.description:
YAPKMS is an adaptation of the Second Brain's concept so that it can be used daily.
It's meant to be easy to use, yet, as organized as you want it to be. Remember, there's no 'one size fits all'. You are encoraged to customize this space the way you want to.

experiences.name: zen_system
experiences.author: https://github.com/Hexara7777
experiences.title: Zen System
experiences.description:
Easy to use system that partially follows the PARA methodology.
More details: https://community.anytype.io/t/zen-system-v0-2-added-to-experience-gallery/12791
